#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<list>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#define ull  unsigned long long 
#define pb push_back
#define in     insert
#define all(v) v.begin(),v.end()
#define rep(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)

using namespace std;
priority_queue <ull> maxheap;
	priority_queue<ull,vector<ull>,greater<ull> > minheap;
	
/*void show(void)
{
	cout<<endl<<"mxheap=";
	if(maxheap.empty()) cout<<"empty";
	while(!maxheap.empty())
	{
		cout<<maxheap.top()<<" ";
		maxheap.pop();
	}
    cout<<endl<<"mnheap=";
	while(!minheap.empty())
	{
		cout<<minheap.top()<<" ";
		minheap.pop();
    }
   if()
cout<<endl;
}*/
int main()
{
	ull op,n,tot=0,tmp,x;
	scanf("%llu",&n);
	while(n--)
	{
			scanf("%llu",&op);
		
		if(op==1)
		{
			scanf("%llu",&x);
			tot++;
		  if(tot<3) maxheap.push(x);
		  else if(tot%3==0)
		  {
		  	maxheap.push(x);
		  	minheap.push(maxheap.top());
		  	maxheap.pop();
		  }
		  else
		  {
		  	    if(x>minheap.top())
		  	    {
		  	       maxheap.push(minheap.top());
				   minheap.pop();	
				   minheap.push(x);
		        }
		        else 
		         maxheap.push(x);
		  }
  
		}
	   
	   else if(op==2)
	   {
	    if(!minheap.empty())  printf("%llu\n",minheap.top());
	    else                  printf("No reviews yet\n");
       }
	
	}
  
  return 0;
}
